channel.title: Mobile Safari on David Calhoun's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Mobile Safari on David Calhoun's blog

item.title: New Mobile Safari stuff in iOS5: position:fixed, overflow:scroll, new input type support, web workers, ECMAScript 5
item.description: (note: this is based on the first iOS5 beta [9A5220p] and is subject to change on final release) It looks like there’s finally some major improvements in mobile Safari, some of which I’ve found below on my “first glance” after downloading the SDK. Chime in if you find anything yourself! Bad news first Much to my disappointment, browser-based file uploads are still not supported (input type=”file”), even though they have been supported on Android since version 2.
